definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: turn aside (Syr. 9t.ap turn, return; Ar. 9at.afa incline, bend);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲטׂף]] turn aside (so Ew Di De Bae:Kau al.), Job 23:9 he turneth aside to the right ([[יׇמִין]]; ‖[[שְׂמאׁול בַּעֲשׂתוֹ]]), rd. prob. 1 S. [[אֶעֱטׂף]] Me Bu Du, I turn... and do not see him ( and ‖[[בִּקַּשְׁתִּו]] ´[[שׂ]]).
